Macros | Functions
bsp_ioexp.h File Reference
External Device Interface API » External IO Expander API

I2C IO expander interface file supporting TCA64xx (16/24). More...

Macros

#define TCA6424_NUM_PORTS   (3U)
 Number of ports in TCA6424 IO expander.
 
#define TCA6416_NUM_PORTS   (2U)
 Number of ports in TCA6416 IO expander.
 
#define TCA64XX_PORT0_OFFSET   (0U)
 Index for PORT0 register.
 
#define TCA64XX_PORT1_OFFSET   (1U)
 Index for PORT1 register.
 
#define TCA64XX_PORT2_OFFSET   (2U)
 Index for PORT2 register - not applicable for TCA6416.
